code: import{useMemo}from"react";import"./style.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COST_OF_DELIVERY=15;function OrderInfo(_ref){let{cartItems,promoState}=_ref;const price=useMemo(()=>{return parseFloat(cartItems.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.price*(item.quantity||1),0)).toFixed(2);},[cartItems]);const totalPrice=useMemo(()=>{return promoState?(price-price*0.1).toFixed(2):price;},[price,promoState]);const checkout=()=>{cartItems.forEach(item=>{const{name,price,quantity}=item;console.log("".concat(name," -
